    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Trennmethoden</string>
            <string language="en">Separation processes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Procédés de séparation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Processos da separação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Processi di separazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαδικασίες χωρισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Procesos de la separación</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Fünf Abbildungen chemischer Trennmethoden sind vorgegeben. Diese sind zu bezeichnen, zu erklären und druch ein Beispiel aus dem Alltag zu ergänzen. Arbeitsblatt für das Gymnasium.</string>
            <string language="en">Five illustrations of chemical separation processes provided for labelling, explaining and matching with an adequate example from everyday life. Worksheet for high school.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Destillieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Dekantieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Filtrieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Sublimieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Zentrifugieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Aggregatzustand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Distilling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Decanting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Filtering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sublimating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Centrifugation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">State of aggregation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinq illustrations des procédés chimiques de 
séparation ont prévu étiqueter, expliquer et apparier avec un 
exemple adéquat de vie quotidienne. Tableau pour le lycée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinco ilustrações de processos químicos da 
separação forneceram etiquetando, explicando e combinando com um 
exemplo adequado da vida diária. Folha para a High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinque illustrazioni dei processi chimici di 
separazione hanno previsto identificare, la spiegazione e la 
corrispondenza con un esempio sufficiente da vita di tutti i giorni. 
Foglio di lavoro per la High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέντε απεικονίσεις των χημικών διαδικασιών χωρισμού 
πρόβλεψαν το μαρκάρισμα, την εξήγηση και το ταίριασμα ένα 
επαρκές παράδειγμα από την καθημερινή ζωή. Φύλλο εργασίας
για το γυμνάσιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cinco ilustraciones de los procesos químicos de 
la separación previeron etiquetar, explicar y corresponder con con un
ejemplo adecuado a partir de la vida diaria. Hoja de trabajo 
para la High School secundaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décantation</string>
          </keyword>
